remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举用于和方法来保护通过加密的数据。This enumeration is used with the and methods to protect data through encryption. **警告：** LocalMachine 枚举值使多个帐户，可以取消保护数据。**Caution** The LocalMachine enumeration value allows multiple accounts to unprotect data. 仅当你信任的计算机上的每个帐户，请使用此值。Use this value only when you trust every account on a computer. 对于大多数情况下，你应使用 CurrentUser 值。For most situations, you should use the CurrentUser value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用数据保护。The following code example shows how to use data protection.
